name: Mesh Rename Bot
description: This bot is aimed to be the best rename bot around.

API_HASH.description: Input your API HASH from Telegram.

API_ID.description: Input your API ID from Telegram.

COMPLETED_STR.description: The symbol that represents the completed part of progress.

REMAINING_STR.description: The symbol that represents the remaining part of progress.

MAX_QUEUE_SIZE.description: Max rename to perform simultaneously. int(number)

SLEEP_SECS.description: Wait in between edits of the progress update.  int(number)

IS_MONGO.description: Is the database URL provided MONGO DB.

IS_PRIVATE.description: Is this bot for private use? true/false

FORCEJOIN.description: Enter the user name(with @) or invite link of the chat that the use should join. Keep blank to disable.

FORCEJOIN_ID.description: ID of the chat for which is specified in FORCEJOIN.

TRACE_CHANNEL.description: ID of the channel to which the track of the uses is sent who are using the bot. Put 0 for no tracking.
